snippet: The militants — who have stolen cattle, raided markets and uprooted farmers — have created a malnutrition crisis in Nigeria that could spill across borders....

byline.contributor: Chris Stein contributed reporting from Lagos, Nigeria.

lead_paragraph: The militants — who have stolen cattle, raided markets and uprooted farmers — have created a malnutrition crisis in Nigeria that could spill across borders.

headline.main: Niger Feels Ripple Effect of Boko Haram as Fears of Food Shortage Spread
headline.print_headline: Niger Feels Ripple Effect of Boko Haram
